name: Preferred Home Health Care & Nursing Services, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Preferred Home Health Care & Nursing Services, Inc. is a Home Health provider based in North Brunswick, NJ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $17.6M in Medicaid payments across 44K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $17.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
